items.title: Scientists make yogurt using ants. The result: tangy and herby
bullets: • Scientists make yogurt using ants
• The result: tangy and herby
• The research team said the yogurt was just barely clumpy at the bottom of the jar
• That's because the ants have their own microbiome that includes lactic acid used in fermentation

• The discovery of three Culiseta annulata mosquitoes was confirmed by the Natural Science Institute of Iceland
• Antarctica is now the only place in the world believed to have no mosquitoes

items.title: ‘We found 23,000 worms!’ The soil project bringing life back to the land
bullets: • Soil is the second largest carbon store after the oceans, but it’s being steadily degraded
• Deforestation, intensive agriculture, urbanisation and pollution have decimated the soil
• One farming community is pioneering a soil health project to show how organic regenerative agriculture can restore this vital ecosystem

bullets: • We want to know what stirs a sense of belonging in the place you call home

items.title: Mental exercise can reverse a brain change linked to aging, study finds
bullets: • A Montreal neurologist says cognitive training can boost levels of a brain chemical that typically declines with age
• The increase "is not huge," says Étienne de Villers-Sidani, a neurologist at McGill University in Montreal
• It's significant, considering that you get a 2.5% decrease per decade normally just with aging, he says

items.title: Found Footage Horror ‘Project Butterfly: Flatwoods’ Coming Halloween Night 2025!
bullets: • Project Butterfly: Flatwoods is a found footage horror film set during the lunar eclipse of 2004, in Flatwoods, West Virginia
• The film follows three students who are filming a school project centered around an investigation that eventually leads them to a government bunker connected to cryptid experimentation
• The further the students dig, the more they uncover the terrifying truths of this bunker

items.title: OpenAI completes restructure, solidifying Microsoft as a major shareholder
bullets: • OpenAI completed its recapitalization, cementing its structure as a nonprofit with a controlling stake in its for-profit business
• The artificial intelligence startup said its nonprofit is now called the OpenAI Foundation, and it holds an equity stake worth about $130 billion
• Microsoft, which has invested over $13 billion in OpenAI, said it supports the move
• The startup is currently valued at $500 billion

items.title: Pregnant British teenager's family pay £137,000 to reduce sentence in Georgia jail
bullets: • Bella Culley, 19, was stopped at Tbilisi International Airport in May
• She was found with 12kg of marijuana and 2kg of hashish in her luggage
• Her family paid 500,000 Georgian Lari (£137,000) to reduce her sentence to two years
• She is 35 weeks pregnant and could give birth in prison

items.title: TikTok threat offering bounty on Pam Bondi leads to federal charges, FBI says
bullets: • Tyler Maxon Avalos posted a TikTok video featuring a photo of Bondi with a “sniper scope red dot” on her forehead, with text reading: “Wanted: Pam Bondi
• REWARD: 45,000
• Dead OR ALIVE (preferably dead)” The FBI said that it was alerted to the video around 9 October and traced the account to Avalos, a resident of St Paul, Minnesota

items.title: After centuries of trauma, Montana’s Blackfeet Nation turns to an old friend for food sovereignty: bison
bullets: • The Blackfeet Nation is a remote and rugged landscape on the windswept plains of northern Montana
• While rich in resources, the remote location and management by the federal government have made food access a challenge
